name: Astral Tracks
description:
Run, jump, dash, slide, swing, and wall run to beat your friends in Astral Tracks’ meditative procedurally generated levels!

Defeat your friends and compete for the top spot on the leaderboards in Astral Tracks - a 3D platforming speedrunner that puts a host of dynamic movement possibilities at your disposal. Offering a unique twist on running platformers, this game challenges you to combine your parkour-esque abilities and master a variety of skills to shave seconds off your times in procedurally generated levels. Unleash your competitive streak and play against friends, family or enemies online, competing for the top-spot on the leaderboards! Or embrace Astral Tracks’ meditative side and find yourself entering a relaxing flow-state as you glide through the tracks. Unlock outlandish costumes for your avatar, adding an extra dimension of fun to your runs through this cyber-futuristic environment!

Dynamic character abilities
Combine parkour abilities to flow through levels and master their use to be the first on the leaderboards. Jump between platforms, pull off Tarzan-like swings, slide down slopes, wall run and sprint to overcome obstacles and move dynamically through the environment. Astral Tracks’ variety of movement options encourages you to refine your runs and experiment with new approaches to compete for the best times as you deal with whatever hurdles and challenges the tracks throw at you.

Meditate or compete
Embrace Astral Tracks’ meditative side and find yourself entering a relaxing flow-state as you glide through the game’s procedurally generated levels. Or unleash your competitive streak and focus on mastering the game’s abilities and finding ways to combine them that shave seconds off your times to defeat your friends and move up the leaderboards.

Thousands of levels to choose from
Procedurally generated levels built from pre-designed chunks deliver unlimited cyber-futuristic tracks to tackle! Each chunk is unique and requires a different combination of movements and a precise use of skills to progress. Refine your highscore over and over again on the same track, or tackle the ludicrous amount of tracks to finish and master!

Leaderboards and multiplayer
Play against friends, family or enemies in online multiplayer, or compete against the world via leaderboards. Astral Tracks’ variety of movement options encourage you to refine your runs and experiment with new approaches to compete for the best times. All tracks can be tackled in single-player, but you may always choose to find like-minded runners worldwide at any time!

Costumes and customisation
While playing Astral Tracks you’ll earn duck-based currency (100% NO microtransactions!) that you can spend unlocking eccentric costumes for your avatar. Dress your robot, astronaut, or other characters with diving fins, plungers, balloon animals or silly hats, have them carry baked goods or a tutu, adding an outlandish splash of fun to the game’s interdimensional sci-fi aesthetics.

Rubber ducking reward system
While recovering from the pressure to be the very best, you may also spend some time collecting different kinds of rubber ducks which can be used to unlock new avatars and costumes. Maybe there are still some hidden inside that track you just finished yesterday?
